rows.label: bf11490150_0010
rows.name: Who is this?

rows.label: bf11490150_0020
rows.name:
Picked him up during a routine
core collection.

rows.label: bf11490150_0025
rows.name: He was one of yours, right?

rows.label: bf11490150_0030
rows.name:
As we discussed, I engaged him as a broker
of cores, but no more.

rows.label: bf11490150_0040
rows.name: What a waste of a human being.

rows.label: bf11490150_0050
rows.name: That much is hard to deny.

rows.label: bf11490150_0060
rows.name: What are you driving at?

rows.label: bf11490150_0070
rows.name:
Waste and refuse can have
their own uses, I think...

rows.label: bf11490150_0080
rows.name: The project we spoke of before...

rows.label: bf11490150_0085
rows.name: I think it may be time to set it in motion.

rows.label: bf11490150_0090
rows.name: You mean... A Blade Eater?

rows.label: bf11490150_0100
rows.name: His strength will grow...exponentially.

rows.label: bf11490150_0110
rows.name: It will dwarf even that of a Man-Eater.

rows.label: bf11490150_0120
rows.name: And you can...control him?

rows.label: bf11490150_0130
rows.name: Oh, please. Even if we can't, there's no need to worry.

rows.label: bf11490150_0140
rows.name: After all, this is just a prototype.

rows.label: bf11490150_0145
rows.name:
Sooner or later, the binding will decay
and he will die.

rows.label: bf11490150_0150
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11490150_0160
rows.name: I hear...

rows.label: bf11490150_0165
rows.name:
..he's got some connection to this 
Paragon of Iira, you see.

rows.label: bf11490150_0167
rows.name: He'll prove useful either way.

rows.label: bf11490150_0170
rows.name: Iira then?

rows.label: bf11490150_0175
rows.name: He's on your mind, isn't he? Metsu...

rows.label: bf11490150_0180
rows.name: Not him, but what comes after...
